name: chaos wizard
description:
nas profundezas da caverna mais úmida dessa lateral do planeta, o mago avista algo que só poderia ser o futuro boiando na panela de sopa. abismado com a imagem que viu, ou apenas tonto devido a quantidade de erva que havia fumado naquele dia, o mago enfia a mão no líquido quente e tenta esganar o seu eu futuro. ao sentir a mão pelando, derruba o jantar inacabado que escorre pelo chão, o fazendo esquecer que havia encontrado o sentido da vida na manhã seguinte.

desenho baseado em uma ilustração de blanche fisher wright.


                                                                                         FNORD


in the depths of the dampest cave on this side of the globe, the wizard spots something that can only be the future floating in the soup pot. stunned by the image or just stoned from all the weed he had smoked that day, the wizard dips his hand into the hot liquid and tries to strangle his future self. once he feels his hand burning, he knocks over the unfinished dinner that runs on the floor, making him forget that he had found the meaning of life in the next morning.

draw this based on a blanche fisher wright illustration.


                                                                                         FNORD
